page.title: 02Housing
page.content: Montsaye pupils did a{Domesday Survey around Desborough and looking at our results it shows that most people were pleased with the housing in the area. People we interviewed said that they would like a bigger house. We walked round Desborough asking people about their houses. A few said they either wanted to move or were actually doing so. On the whole most people were pleased to remain here. We went to some really new houses that had only been lived in for less than a year. They were very pleasant houses but the residents said there ought to be more central heating because in the winter it is so cold. Also they said they wished all the houses had a porch. New houses are still being built on this site which is on the{Braybrooke Road,leading from Desborough.
